page.title: 07A DAY AT OUR SCHOOL
page.content: THURSDAY-A TYPICAL DAY IN SUMMER TERM 8.55 School begins,9.00 Register called 9.05 Religious radio Assembly. in hall 9.40 Write about the programme. 10.00 Swimming lesson in pool.10.40 playtime.10.55 Mathematics lessons.12.00 Lunch,packed,school or home.12.45 playtime .Afternoon session 1.15 Register, Girls craftwork,Boys Art and modelling.2.30 Playtime 2.45 Girls craftwork,Boys Art and modelling 3.15 Infants depart for home 3.45 Juniors depart.After school Sports and Athletics practice. This is a typical day spent by theupper juniors in the summerterm.During the winter and autumnterms swimming would be replaced by gymnastics,drama lessons introduced in the afternoons together with science and creative writing or grammar work.Music lessons and choral work are also introduced inthese terms
